verses.text: Unto thee will I \w cry|strong="H7121"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*; be not \w silent|strong="H2814"\w* to me: lest, \add if\add* thou be \w silent|strong="H2790"\w* to me, I \w become|strong="H4911"\w* like them that go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* into the \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*.\f + \fr 28.1 \ft to me: Heb. from me\f*

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of my \w supplications|strong="H8469"\w*, when I \w cry|strong="H7768"\w* unto thee, when I lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* my \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* toward thy \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w oracle|strong="H1687"\w*.\f + \fr 28.2 \ft thy…: or, the oracle of thy sanctuary\f*

Draw me not \w away|strong="H4900"\w* with the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, and with the \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* of \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*, which \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* to their \w neighbours|strong="H7453"\w*, but \w mischief|strong="H7451"\w* \add is\add* in their \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w*.

\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* them according to their \w deeds|strong="H6467"\w*, and according to the \w wickedness|strong="H7455"\w* of their \w endeavours|strong="H4611"\w*: \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them after the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*; \w render|strong="H7725"\w* to them their \w desert|strong="H1576"\w*.

Because they \w regard|strong="H0995"\w* not the \w works|strong="H6468"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, nor the \w operation|strong="H4639"\w* of his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, he shall \w destroy|strong="H2040"\w* them, and not build them \w up|strong="H1129"\w*.
\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, because he hath \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of my \w supplications|strong="H8469"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* my \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* and my \w shield|strong="H4043"\w*; my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w trusted|strong="H0982"\w* in him, and I am \w helped|strong="H5826"\w*: therefore my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* greatly \w rejoiceth|strong="H5937"\w*; and with my \w song|strong="H7892"\w* will I \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* him.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* their \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*, and he \add is\add* the \w saving|strong="H3444"\w* \w strength|strong="H4581"\w* of his \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*.\f + \fr 28.8 \ft their: or, his\f*\f + \fr 28.8 \ft saving…: Heb. strength of salvations\f*

\w Save|strong="H3467"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thine \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*: \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* them also, and lift them \w up|strong="H5375"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.\f + \fr 28.9 \ft feed: or, rule\f*
